column6:
The Human Torch is chasing a Pterodactyl around the Chrysler Building. A Brontosaurus is dragging The Thing down 5th Avenue. The Invisible Girl is trying to make a Tyrannosaurus stop chewing on her husband. Dinosaurs have come to New York, and they're not planning on going extinct this time! ,2005,10

32 PGS./ALL AGES ...$2.50
column7: | Fantastic Four | Human Torch | Invisible Woman | Mr. Fantastic | Thing
